name: Potravinářská komora České republiky - Federation of the Food And Drink Indurstries of the Czech Republic
membership:
FoodDrinkEurope www.fooddrinkeurope.eu
ETP Food For Life
goal: The food and drink industry wants to play its part as an active partner in addressing these challenges. To ensure that Czech Republic and Europe continues to have the highest quality and safest food in the world. To drive prosperity and ensure quality jobs. Federation's role is to help the industry, policy-makers and civil society work together towards these goals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food Law
Environmental Law
Supply Chain and Unfair Trading Practices
Research and innovations
Labour and consumer
